item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18710)
item.content:encoded:

cUrl error: (0)

item.title: Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the money raised will go toward our emergency fund in case someone is detained or in immediate need of a lawyer. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Photo by @traeben1717, who is working alongside several folks to create a documentary about the #SolidarityMeals program.
Director: Tyler Borkowski @little_bork_man
Producer: Chloe Halvorson @uunga.bunga...
Director of Photography: Trae Beneck @traeben1717
Lead Journalist: Karen Manley @karennmanley
Translator: Luis Castro Ortega

item.title: Families Sanctuary for All Please help us to support immigrant...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Families Sanctuary for All Please help us to support immigrant families in these hard times now that their legal costs remain and to help them provide for some things such as food or any other indispensable necessities now that some have lost their jobs because of COVID-19. Please donate what you can Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All. Por favor ayuda o apoya a familias immigrantes ya que sus costos legales en sus procesos de deportaciÃ³n continÃºan y para apoyar con algunas cosas indispensables como comida o algunos gastos de utilidades ya que con este problema del COVID-19 algunos perdieron su empleo o los descansaron por tiempo indefinido Dona a Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All

item.title: Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend!...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend! Sheâ€™s raising money to hire a lawyer for her sonâ€™s immigration case once it gets closer to his court date. You can support here: https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Unlike in criminal proceedings, people in immigration court have no right to a lawyer, and so anyone who cannot afford one must represent themselves. There are some local stopgap programs, such as the Rocky Mountain Immigrant Advocacy Network, which provides ...free legal services to people in immigrant detention, and the Denver Immigrant Legal Services Fund, which pays immigration attorneys to represent people who would otherwise be unable to obtain a lawyer (disappointingly, the Aurora City Council recently voted not to establish a similar immigrant legal defense fund). Our goal is to create a world where immigration courts donâ€™t exist at all, but while theyâ€™re here, we will demand for and help fund legal representation for everyone we can.

#solidaritymeals #sanctuary4all #abolishice #abolishprisons #mutualaid

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement weather until next saturday 3/20. We are sorry for the inconvenience but we want you all to stay safe and off the roads! We are messaging everyone individually to ensure you are able to collect next Saturday and if not we will do our best to accommodate! Thank you for all of your support and stay warm!
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with her very popular pupusas! Yessenia is a beloved leader of Sanctuary4All who, like many of you, has been disappointed in the Biden administration so far as they have failed to make immediate restoration to the communities Trump harmed. This includes our own Democratic senator John Hickenlooper, who has not used his new position to provide aid to immigrants like many other Democratic politicians have in other states. It continues to be up to communities to protect and fight for each other rather than the people our taxes pay to represent us to do their job & serve us. We depend on each other. You can help support Yessenia and her family this weekend by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoRep. Iman Jodeh shared a post to the group: Coloradans for Progressive Action.It is indescribably meaningful to me...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoRep. Iman Jodeh shared a post to the group: Coloradans for Progressive Action.

It is indescribably meaningful to me that the first bill I have moved through its first committee is a bill fighting for renters' rights. I truly believe housin...g is a human right. It brings me a great sense of pride to work on this bill with my friend from a neighboring-district, State Representative Dominique Jackson Stay tuned for calls to action!

item.title: UPDATE Angel's family - Call Governor Newsom at...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

UPDATE Angel's family - Call Governor Newsom at 916-445-2841 and let him know now thanks to his inaction ***Angel has been deported*** and is far from his family. Ask him to stop ICE transfers in California. Keep this from happening to other families!

You could say "I am calling your office to request you end ICE transfers from California prisons. After you allowed ICE to pick up Angel Benito A#204-239-454, he tested positive last month for COVID and is at high risk for serious long term impacts. He's now in a country he's barely lived in without his immediate family."
Abolish ICE Denver Sanctuary4All Colorado Colorado People's Alliance
#StopICEtransfers #100DaysOfFreedom
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Ingrid is bringing a new dish this weekend to solidarity meals:...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Ingrid is bringing a new dish this weekend to solidarity meals: empanadas! Not to mention her beautiful artisanal gifts including ponchos, beanies, masks, and jewelry from her home country Peru and some coming from Mexico as well! Don't forget to place your order soon; orders close tomorrow night! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
